title: Port Grammar::Parameterized::Resolver
description: Add Parameterized::Resolver to manage parameterized rules, inline lookup, and argument validation.

title: Epic: Phase 3 Crystal runtime and code generation
description: Implement Crystal runtime library and Crystal code generation for parser output.

title: Port reporter output and diagnostics
description: Implement reporter outputs for grammar, rules, states, conflicts, and precedence.

title: Wire grammar parser declarations into symbol resolver
description: Update GrammarParser to create symbols/types/precedences via Grammar model methods instead of only storing declarations, aligning behavior with Ruby lrama.

title: Port grammar file parser to Crystal
description: Implement parsing of lrama grammar files in Crystal, matching current semantics (directives, precedence, conflicts).

title: Implement stdlib merge, parameterized rules, and inline resolution
description: Port stdlib merge logic and parameterized/inline rule resolution to match Ruby behavior.

title: Port Grammar::Binding
description: Add Grammar::Binding helper for parameterized rule resolution (argument binding and InstantiateRule rewriting).

title: Port Grammar::Rule and RuleBuilder
description: Implement Grammar::Rule and RuleBuilder with reference numbering, parameterized expansion, and inline resolution.

title: Port Digraph algorithm for LALR propagation
description: Port lrama/lib/lrama/digraph.rb to Crystal; used for read/follow set propagation in LALR.

title: Generate Crystal parser code
description: Implement Crystal code generator for parser tables/actions targeting the Crystal runtime (no C extensions).

title: Test suite parity and golden outputs
description: Port/author tests to validate Crystal output vs Ruby lrama behavior; add golden fixture coverage.

title: Add Crystal performance benchmarks
description: Benchmark lexer, grammar generation, and runtime parsing speed/memory.

title: Port diagram generation
description: Recreate diagram output generation in Crystal.

title: Epic: Phase 5 Performance and validation
description: Performance tuning, benchmarks, and broader spec parity.

title: Add grammar parser fixtures for parameterized rules
description: Port a subset of Ruby lrama fixtures to Crystal specs to validate parser.y parity for parameterized rules, named references, and prologue/epilogue handling.

title: Implement grammar parser from parser.y
description: Build Crystal grammar parser matching lrama/parser.y directives, actions, and error behavior.

title: Add Crystal templates and table compression
description: Create Crystal output templates and optional table compression strategies.

title: Port grammar Counter utility
description: Add Grammar::Counter helper used by rule builders and state numbering.

title: Epic: Phase 2 State construction and analysis
description: Port LR/LALR state generation, conflict resolution, and IELR support.

title: Port grammar model (symbols, rules, types, precedence)
description: Port lrama/lib/lrama/grammar/* into Crystal, including symbols, rules, precedence, and code containers.

title: Epic: Phase 4 CLI, reporting, and diagnostics
description: Port CLI options, reporting, warnings, and diagram output to Crystal.

title: Port Grammar::Parameterized rule and rhs
description: Implement Grammar::Parameterized::Rule and ::Rhs classes and update grammar parser/model to use them.

title: Set up Crystal shard skeleton
description: Create lrama.cr shard structure, basic CLI entrypoint, and CI hooks for Crystal builds.
close_reason: Shard skeleton and CLI entrypoint created (shard.yml, src/lrama.cr, src/lrama/cli.cr)

title: Port Grammar rule assembly (collect/fill symbols)
description: Implement Grammar methods to collect symbols from rule builders and fill symbol metadata, producing Rule objects similar to Ruby grammar.rb.

title: Port Grammar::Symbol and symbol table
description: Implement Grammar::Symbol and symbol table utilities (terms/nterms, numbering, lookup) to match Ruby lrama grammar model.

title: Add Crystal spec harness
description: Create minimal Crystal spec harness for lexer fixtures.
close_reason: Added minimal Crystal spec harness for lexer fixtures

title: Design Crystal port architecture
description: Define Crystal-first parser generation architecture, public APIs, runtime expectations, and performance strategy (no Ruby/C extension runtime).

title: Implement LR/LALR state machine
description: Port items, closure, goto, and lookahead propagation for LR/LALR states.

title: Add Crystal lexer fixtures
description: Add spec fixtures for lexer/parser development in Crystal port.
close_reason: Added Crystal lexer fixtures under spec/fixtures

title: Optimize hot paths and memory layout
description: Tune lexer/parser tables, state transitions, and runtime stacks for speed and low allocations.

title: Finalize lexer parity and UserCode references
description: Complete UserCode reference scanning and ensure lexer behavior matches Ruby for all directives and error messages.
close_reason: Ported UserCode reference scanning and added Grammar::Reference with specs

title: Performance benchmarking and optimization
description: Benchmark Crystal-generated parsers; optimize table compression, memory layout, and hot paths for speed.

title: Port Grammar::Union and Auxiliary
description: Add Grammar::Union for %union metadata and Auxiliary container for prologue/epilogue line numbers.

title: Port warnings and logging
description: Implement warnings and logger behavior from lrama/lib/lrama/warnings/* and logger.rb.

title: Implement Crystal code generator
description: Emit Crystal parser code and tables (actions, goto, rule metadata) from grammar/states.

title: Port Ruby lexer specs to Crystal
description: Adapt lrama/spec/lrama/lexer_spec.rb into Crystal specs and add equivalent fixtures.
close_reason: Ported Ruby lexer spec coverage into Crystal and added fixtures

title: Port core grammar/state specs
description: Port critical Ruby specs covering grammar parsing and state generation into Crystal.

title: Epic: Phase 1 Grammar frontend parity
description: Complete lexer+parser parity and grammar model porting based on parser.y and grammar/*

title: Implement Crystal parser runtime
description: Build parser runtime stack, action/goto dispatch, error recovery, and token interfaces in Crystal.

title: Implement IELR refinement
description: Port IELR computation from Ruby States#compute_ielr.

title: Documentation and migration guide
description: Document Crystal usage, parser API, differences from Ruby lrama, and migration guidance.

title: Implement LR state construction in Crystal
description: Port LR(1) state graph construction, lookahead propagation, and conflict resolution to Crystal.

title: Port State class and conflict types
description: Port lrama/lib/lrama/state.rb plus shift/reduce conflict classes to Crystal; needed for LR/LALR.

title: Implement grammar parser skeleton and sectioning
description: Add initial Grammar and GrammarParser to split declarations/rules/epilogue and expose prologue.
close_reason: Grammar parser skeleton and sectioning implemented

title: Build Crystal parser runtime
description: Create Crystal runtime library (parser base, lexer interface, error recovery) so generated parsers are pure Crystal.

title: Port States LALR lookahead and conflict computation
description: Implement States#compute_look_ahead_sets, conflicts, and default reduction from lrama/lib/lrama/states.rb in Crystal.

title: Port CLI options and defaults
description: Match lrama CLI options, defaults, and behaviors from options.rb and command.rb.

title: Port counterexamples generation
description: Implement counterexample generation for conflicts based on lrama/lib/lrama/counterexamples/*

title: Port conflict resolution and reporting structures
description: Implement shift/reduce and reduce/reduce conflict handling and annotations.

title: Add grammar validation and warning parity
description: Port grammar validation checks and warning behaviors to match Ruby lrama messages.
